definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: smelting-pot or furnace (Ar. kuwr; NH id.; Aram. id., kuwr; Eth. kawr:)—pot or furnace for smelting metals, but alw. in metaph. or sim. of human sufferings in punishment or discipline: iron (fig. of Egypt as place of bondage) [[הַבַּרְזֶל]] ´[[מִכּ]] De 4:20, Je 11:4, ´[[הַבּ]] ´[[מִתּוֹח כ]] 1Ki 8:51; gold [[לַזׇּהָב]] ´[[כ]] Pr 17:3 = Pr 27:21 (‖[[מַחְרֵף]]); various metals Ez Eze 22:18, Eze 22:20, Eze 22:22; once [[בְּכוּר עָׂנִי]] Is 48:10 in a smelting-pot of affliction.
